column2:
"Crawford, what just happened?
Did Dark Falz manage to run away again?"

"Everything will be
alright. Stay calm."

"Let me start from
the beginning."

"First, we can all assume Dark Falz fled into
a separate dimension, as he once did previously."

"However, he is
now wounded."

"He appears to have some degree of regenerative abilities, but he can't
fully heal without that docking bay in Stia's central region."

"So eventually he will have to
reappear in this dimension."
"How do you know all this?"
"From Rysas' documents."

"That, as well as some data
assembled by Ilma and I."

"Rysas kept painstakingly thorough records of the battle with Dark Falz
that took place in Kvaris a hundred years ago."

"He was incredibly thorough and descriptive.
Going through his records was like being there in person."

"He wrote about Dark Falz's behavioral
patterns, and the times he was active."

"The Kvarisian ARKS back then had put
up quite a good fight against Dark Falz."

"He wrote how, after receiving critical damage due to concentrated fire,
Dark Falz would take refuge \"somewhere\" and wouldn't return for a while."

"And, when he returned some time later,
all the areas that were damaged were healed."

"That \"somewhere\" turned out to be
that place in Stia."
"So there was that much information in Rysas' documents..."

"Yeah. I didn't believe it myself until I
actually saw the central region of Stia."
"...Nevertheless."

"We've always thought that Dark Falz and
the DOLLS came from the \"outside\"..."

"But now we find a structure of that scale
and complexity within our very own Halpha."

"One can't help but wonder when all of
that was made... and who made it."

"...Well, let's set speculation
aside for now."
"Our next course of action is simple."

"We use the completed Central Cannon to fire
a second volley at Dark Falz as he reappears."

"We've nearly completed analysis on his Photon spectra.
We'll be able to tell when and where he'll reappear."

"Even if he does escape again, we'll
know where his destination is."

"We'll keep attacking like this, whittling
him down piece by piece if we have to."

"Even if it takes time, all that matters
is that we win this in the end..."
"...It's just, there's one small problem."

"We don't actually know if this Dark Falz and the
Dark Falz in Rysas' records are one and the same entity."

"If they are completely different beings entirely, this
one could be capable of things not recorded in the data."
"Rather, I should say he most likely will be."
"This is Dark Falz we're dealing with, after all."

"We have several back-up plans being arranged for, but
how useful they'll be will depend on the situation..."
"In that case..."

"Our hope will rest on the strength
of each and every member of ARKS."
"As for when he reappears..."

"<%me>, just as before, I'd like you
to be on the front lines."
"What about us?"
"I have plans for you as well."

"I'll contact you about that later, I just
need some time to finalize things."
"Yup, understood."

"Thank you for allowing me to
impose upon you all for just a bit longer."

"Don't worry about it.
We'll get through this one way or another!"
"That's how we've always done things anyways."
"Right?"
